sentences.sentence: The general lifted the ban on political parties.
sentences.translation: 将军解除了对政党的官方禁令。

sentences.sentence: Canada will ban smoking in all offices later this year.
sentences.translation: 加拿大将于今年晚些时候禁止在所有办公场所吸烟。

sentences.sentence: Top supermarkets are to ban many genetically modified foods.
sentences.translation: 顶级的超市将禁止销售许多转基因的食品。
